title: Inside Planned Parenthood's secret new abortion clinic in Illinois
text:
I am lying back on a grey leather bed, legs akimbo, as man in his sixties stands beside me, holding a drill.

“Can you give us a minute?” my doctor asks him. “We’re doing an abortion here”.

Welcome to Planned Parenthood Fairview Heights, southern Illinois; that rarest of things in 2019 America – a brand new abortion clinic, which is scheduled to open its doors to patients this week.

For a year, this 18,000sq ft low-rise breezeblock of a building, which cost $7m, was known by the codename ‘Alaska’. It was built in secret – until earlier this month, most of the medical staff now rushing round its corridors had no idea it existed at all.

Some in the pro-life movement have pointed to this cloak...
description: I am lying back on a grey leather bed, legs akimbo, as man in his sixties stands beside me, holding a drill.
